1: <pb/><t>Re' taq i hat wuch aj Israel yohb'aal wach i ti' k'axik taq ak'ulum,</t> <t>xa re' wo' rutohq'iik chee qatinamiit cha q'or taq chi je' wili:</t>
2: <t>Re' hoj yohb'aal wach i ti' k'axik qak'ulum, xa re' wo' rutohq'iik chee qatinamiit.</t> <t>Xa re' la', xakomajaa' ta wo' chih qoh kuchej.</t>
3: <t>Eh yohb'aal wach ti'kiil inki a'n qeh, k'ahchi'kooj kiye'em chi tz'uhuum,</t> <t>xa rukanaa' chik rehtalil chi qajurub'.</t>
4: <t>Eh re' QaJaaw Dios korik wach ruk'ux,</t> <t>re' reh xko'linik qeh pan kiq'ab' i yiib' wach kina'ojb'al.</t>
5: <t>Neeta naq inkimol chi elik ruum kik'ixiik</t> <t>taqe i ki-ixowanik wach i tinamit Si√≥n.</t>
6: <t>Eh nee ta naq kikahnik chi xa je' kikab' i ch'ahn impoq' naah paat</t> <t>inchiqik noq komajaa' inchuqarik.</t>
7: <t>Eh chi xa je' kikab' i ch'ahn xama' xta inkamanik wii' reh isik'il trigo,</t> <t>eh ni xata kamanik reh imb'ak'wik paam chi chuhtaal.</t>
8: <t>Eh awach i ki-ik'ik ma' kiq'or ta chi je' wili:</t> <t>Re' QaJaaw Dios inkuxisanik keh, ma' inko'q ta taqe.</t> <t>Eh ni xata neenpahqaljik i rotob'il i Dios chikinaah.</t>
